keyMoments.title: Revolutionary Army Introduced
keyMoments.description: Robin explains that the Revolutionary Army is an organization led by Dragon that openly opposes the World Government and has overthrown several monarchies.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most important organizations in One Piece, setting up future conflicts with the World Government.

description: An organization led by Monkey D. Dragon that openly opposes the World Government. They have been responsible for overthrowing several monarchies, and the World Government considers Dragon the most dangerous criminal in the world.
